metadata.notes: ToYou prices scraped directly from toyou.io menu pages. Keeta prices not publicly available on web (app-only). Carriage (trycarriage.com) website SSL error/down at time of collection. Prices in SAR.

keeta_overview.launch_date: September 9, 2024 (Al Kharj), expanded to Riyadh October 2024
keeta_overview.discounts: Up to 70% on select meals at launch
keeta_overview.coverage: Riyadh, Jeddah, Makkah, Madinah, Dammam, Al Kharj, Al Ahsa
keeta_overview.top_categories_riyadh: Fast food #1, Arabic cuisine #2, Desserts & Beverages ~20% of orders
keeta_overview.riyadh_trends: Strong demand for grilled meats and Arabic platters
keeta_overview.comparison_notes: HungerStation has 55,000+ restaurants across 102+ cities. Keeta competes with free delivery and aggressive discounts. Saudi food delivery market projected at $11.74B (2024), growing 5.2% annually to $15.13B by 2029.

toyou_overview.restaurants_on_web: 58 merchants listed on Riyadh web page

carriage_overview.notes: Carriage still operates in KSA but appears less prominent. Website had SSL certificate issues during data collection. Available on iOS/Android app stores.

keeta.source: Keeta has 25,000+ restaurant partners; AlBaik is one of KSA's most popular chains and widely available on all major platforms

carriage.notes: Carriage has 2000+ restaurants; AlBaik likely available but unverified

keeta.source: Major chain widely available on Keeta

summary.keeta_price_note: Keeta prices are app-only and not available on their website. Keeta is known for competitive pricing with free delivery on orders over SAR 25.
summary.carriage_note: Carriage website (trycarriage.com) was inaccessible during data collection. They have a Facebook page (CarriageKSA) with 5,294 likes. The app is still available on app stores.

delivery_fee.keeta: Free on orders over SAR 25 (no subscription needed)
delivery_fee.hungerstation: Varies, subscription available for free delivery

market_position.jahez: #2 - strong local player, IPO'd on Saudi market
market_position.keeta: New entrant - 25,000+ restaurants, aggressive growth with Meituan backing
market_position.toyou: Growing player, 60+ cities, fast delivery focus
